text: Niscaya asamanasamuha o yaminera srstira dina theke'i [1] allah‌ra bidhane [2] allah‌ra kache gananaya masa barati [3], tara madhye carati nisid'dha masa [4], eta'i pratisthita dina [5]. Kaje'i era madhye tomara nijedera prati yuluma karo na ebam tomara musarikadera sathe sarbatmakabhabe yud'dha kara, yemana tara tomadera birud'dhe sarbatmakabhabe yud'dha kare thake. Ara jene rakha, niscaya allah‌ muttakidera sathe achena
